sen.j: 北畠 政郷（きたばたけ まささと、宝徳元年（1449年） - 永正5年（1508年））は、室町時代中期の公卿。
sen.e: Masasato KITABATAKE (1449-1508) was a court noble in the middle of the Muromachi period.
Masasato KITABATAKE (1449-1508) was a court noble in the middle of the Muromachi period.
Masasato KITABATAKE (1449-1508) was a court noble in the middle of the Muromachi period.

sen.j: 伊勢国国司北畠家の第5代当主。
sen.e: He was the fifth head of the Ise no kuni Kokushi (the governor of Ise Province), the Kitabatake family.
He was the fifth head of the Ise no kuni Kokushi (the governor of Ise Province), the Kitabatake family.
He was the fifth head of the Ise no kuni Kokushi (the governor of Ise Province), the Kitabatake family.
His former name was `Masatomo.'
His former name was `Masatomo.'
His former name was 'Masatomo.'
He was the child of Noritomo KITABATAKE.
He was the child of Noritomo KITABATAKE.
He was the child of Noritomo KITABATAKE.

sen.j: 1471年、父の死に伴い北畠家当主となる。
sen.e: He became the head of the Kitabatake family in 1471 after his father passed away.
He became the head of the Kitabatake family in 1471 after his father passed away.
He became the head of the Kitabatake family in 1471 after his father passed away.

sen.j: 伊勢北方守護となり、勢力拡大を目指し長野工藤氏ら諸豪と抗争を繰り返したが、大きな戦果は上げられなかった。
sen.e: He became the Ise Northern Shugo (provincial constable), and continued struggles against Gozoku (local ruling family) including the Naganokudo clan aiming for its greater force; he couldn't achieve great results.

He became the Ise Northern Shugo (provincial constable), and continued the strugge against Gozoku (local ruling family) including the Naganokudo clan aiming for its greater force; he couldn't achieve great results.

He became the Ise Northern Shugo (provincial constable), and continued the strugge against Gozoku (local ruling family) including the Naganokudo clan aiming for its greater force; he couldn't achieve great results.
His children included Kichika KITABATAKE.
His children included Kichika KITABATAKE.
His children included Kichika KITABATAKE.

sen.j: 彼の系統からは四男北畠顕晴に始まる田丸氏などが出ている。
sen.e: The tamaru clan originated in his fourth son, 北畠顕晴, was from his lineage.
sen.cmt: 北畠顕晴→読み方不明のため原文表記としています。
sen.e: The tamaru clan originated in his fourth son, 北畠顕晴, was from his lineage.
His lineage originated several clans including the tamaru clan originated in his fourth son, Akiharu KITABATAKE.
He passed away in 1508.
He passed away in 1508.
He passed away in 1508.
